cost_method.description: Costing method when using isis protocol
cost_method.usage: The chosen method to perform cost operation of all the interfaces of the router. For OSPF the cost_method is maxLinkMetric and for ISIS is overload

cost_protocol.usage: Cost operation will be performed on the IGP specified using this parameter

provider.description: Provider to be used to connect to the router for costing operations

cost_threshold_percent.description: Traffic utilization threshold percentage (in decimal format) to check cost process. For example 0.7 means 70%
cost_threshold_percent.usage: If the parameter is set to 0.7, cost out operation is considered successful if the traffic falls to less than 70% of the previous traffic for all interfaces that are part of the IGP. Similarly, cost in is considered successful if traffic grows to more than 70% of the previous traffic for all interface part of IGP.

cost_proc_id.description: OSPF process id on which cost operation needs to be performed, when using ospf protocol
cost_proc_id.usage: Process id of the protocol under which the costing operation should be performed.

cost_vrf.description: VRF on which cost operation needs to be performed, when using ospf protocol

items.description: Router interfaces which need to be checked for state

if_names.usage: All interfaces specified using this parameter will be monitored for state change

items.description: JSON List of SMU package names to be installed on the router, or a tar containing SMU packages

packages.usage: These are the names of the packages as seen on router

optimize.description: Whether or not to optimize the package list.
optimize.usage: Set this to true to install dependent SMUs. Dependent SMU is the one which requires pre-requisite SMU to be installed before installing this SMU

region.description: Default region which tracks the location of a node.

dlm_credential_profile.description: the name of the tracked/configured credential profile in DLM containing the repositories auth credentials.
dlm_credential_profile.usage: The credential profile added in Crosswork which is used as SMU repository

type.description: The type of repository which holds the pacakge(s) in question.
type.usage: The repository type used to store the packages

address.description: The Address where the repository can be reached at. Required if the 'Type' is 'TFTP', 'FTP', 'SFTP', 'SCP'.
address.usage: This is the source IP address of the SMU repository

source.description: The absolute filepath to the server directory hosting the packages. Required if the 'Type' is 'TFTP', 'FTP', 'SFTP', 'SCP', 'LOCAL'.
source.usage: This is the absolute path of the package from where the SMU will be copied

destination.description: The destination folder where the package(s) should be stored on the device in question. Required If 'Type' is 'SCP'.
destination.usages: The destination folder on the device to which the SMU will be copied

vrf.description: the VRF used for FTP or TFTP, if any.
vrf.usage: The VRF used for FTP or TFTP, if any

collection_type.description: Collection type to be used for verfication checks. For Install consistency and Install verify checks, if Telemetry sensor path is not resolved or if SNMP is choosen as collection type, verification will be done using CLI data collection

mop_timeout.description: Timeout duration for MoP. e.g. 900s, 10m, 1.5h, etc. Valid time units are 'ns', 'us' (or 'Âµs'), 'ms', 's', 'm', 'h'.
